entry.cantonese: 你叫咩名？請問你貴姓呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 giu3 me1 ming4? cing2 man6 nei5 gwai3 sing3 aa3?
entry.english: What is your name? May I ask your surname?

entry.cantonese: 你點呀？你最近點啊？屋企人點啊？
entry.jyutping: nei5 dim2 aa3? nei5 zeoi3 gan6 dim2 aa3? uk1 kei2 jan4 dim2 aa3?
entry.english: How are you? How have you been recently? How's your family?

entry.cantonese: 你可唔可以介紹吓自己呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 gaai3 siu6 haa5 zi6 gei2 aa3?
entry.english: Can you introduce yourself?

entry.cantonese: 你啲中文學成點呀？你學咗幾耐廣東話？你仲識講咩語言？
entry.jyutping: nei5 di1 zung1 man4 hok6 sing4 dim2 aa3? nei5 hok6 zo2 gei2 noi6 gwong2 dung1 waa6? nei5 zung6 sik1 gong2 me1 jyu5 jin4?
entry.english: How is your Chinese learning? How long have you been learning Cantonese? What other languages can you speak?

entry.cantonese: 你由邊度嚟架？你喺邊度住呀？住咗幾耐？
entry.jyutping: nei5 jau4 bin1 dou6 lai4 gaa3? nei5 hai2 bin1 dou6 zyu6 aa3? zyu6 zo2 gei2 noi6?
entry.english: Where are you from? Where do you live? How long have you lived there?

entry.cantonese: 你鍾意食法國嘢，日本嘢定係中國嘢？你鍾唔鍾意廣東菜？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zung1 ji3 sik6 faat3 gwok3 je5, jat6 bun2 je5 ding6 hai6 zung1 gwok3 je5? nei5 zung1 m4 zung1 ji3 gwong2 dung1 coi3?
entry.english: Do you like French food, Japanese food, or Chinese food? Do you like Cantonese cuisine?

entry.cantonese: 你食完晚飯通常做乜嘢？今晚食乜餸？
entry.jyutping: nei5 sik6 jyun4 maan5 faan6 tung1 soeng4 zou6 mat1 je5? gam1 maan5 sik6 mat1 sung3?
entry.english: What do you usually do after dinner? What are you having for dinner tonight?

entry.cantonese: 夏天過成點呀？你有冇去旅行？
entry.jyutping: haa6 tin1 gwo3 sing4 dim2 aa3? nei5 jau5 mou5 heoi3 leoi5 hang4?
entry.english: How was your summer? Did you go traveling?

entry.cantonese: 而家幾點鐘呀？今日星期幾？
entry.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 gei2 dim2 zung1 aa3? gam1 jat6 sing1 kei4 gei2?
entry.english: What time is it now? What day of the week is it today?

entry.cantonese: 學得點呀？你喺學校學緊啲咩呀？你主修邊科㗎？
entry.jyutping: hok6 dak1 dim2 aa3? nei5 hai2 hok6 haau6 hok6 gan2 di1 me1 aa3? nei5 zyu2 sau1 bin1 fo1 gaa3?
entry.english: How is your studying? What are you learning at school? What is your major?

entry.cantonese: 你做乜嘢工作呀？你喺邊度返工？你最近忙唔忙呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zou6 mat1 je5 gung1 zok3 aa3? nei5 hai2 bin1 dou6 faan1 gung1? nei5 zeoi3 gan6 mong4 m4 mong4 aa3?
entry.english: What do you do for work? Where do you work? Have you been busy recently?

entry.cantonese: 你有冇去過中國呀？香港咩？
entry.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mou5 heoi3 gwo3 zung1 gwok3 aa3? hoeng1 gong2 me1?
entry.english: Have you been to China? What about Hong Kong?

entry.cantonese: 你嘅興趣係咩？你點樣減壓？
entry.jyutping: nei5 ge3 hing3 ceoi3 hai6 me1? nei5 dim2 joeng6 gaam2 ngaat3?
entry.english: What are your hobbies? How do you relieve stress?

entry.cantonese: 你最鍾意邊個歌手呀？你最鍾意嘅電視節目係咩？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 bin1 go3 go1 sau2 aa3? nei5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 ge3 din6 si6 zit3 muk6 hai6 me1?
entry.english: Who is your favorite singer? What is your favorite TV program?

entry.cantonese: 你鍾唔鍾意唱聖誕歌呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 zung1 m4 zung1 ji3 coeng3 sing3 daan3 go1 aa3?
entry.english: Do you like singing Christmas songs?

entry.cantonese: 你放假諗住去邊度玩呀？你聖誕假諗住去邊玩呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 fong3 gaa3 nam2 zyu6 heoi3 bin1 dou6 waan2 aa3? nei5 sing3 daan3 gaa3 nam2 zyu6 heoi3 bin1 waan2 aa3?
entry.english: Where do you plan to go during your holiday? Where do you plan to go during the Christmas holiday?

entry.cantonese: 你有冇玩樂器呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mou5 waan2 ngok6 hei3 aa3?
entry.english: Do you play any musical instruments?

entry.cantonese: 今日啲天氣點呀？聽日會唔會落雨㗎？
entry.jyutping: gam1 jat6 di1 tin1 hei3 dim2 aa3? ting1 jat6 wui5 m4 wui5 lok6 jyu5 gaa3?
entry.english: How's the weather today? Will it rain tomorrow?

entry.cantonese: 你有冇喺學校到讀中文？你啲中文喺邊到學返嚟㗎？
entry.jyutping: nei5 jau5 mou5 hai2 hok6 haau6 dou6 duk6 zung1 man4? nei5 di1 zung1 man4 hai2 bin1 dou6 hok6 faan1 lai4 gaa3?
entry.english: Did you study Chinese at school? Where did you learn your Chinese?

entry.cantonese: 你通常幾點鐘起身㗎？你今朝有無食早餐呀？
entry.jyutping: nei5 tung1 soeng4 gei2 dim2 zung1 hei2 san1 gaa3? nei5 gam1 ziu1 jau5 mou5 sik6 zou2 caan1 aa3?
entry.english: What time do you usually get up? Did you have breakfast this morning?

entry.cantonese: 點解有啲人會唔鍾意聖誕節嘅？
你舊年聖誕收過最正嘅禮物係咩呀？你今年諗住送聖誕禮物俾咩人呀？
你鍾意聽音樂多啲吖，定係唱歌多啲呀？
你諗住去邊度過你個暑假呀？
你有冇養寵物㗎？
呢個世界有冇外星人㗎？
你信唔信奇跡㗎？
你點樣減壓？
呢個世界係咪電腦模擬出嚟嘅呢？
如果而家停電，會發生啲咩事呢？
講大話可唔可以係合符道德嘅呢？
可唔可以介紹幾味齋菜呀？
你上次捐錢係幾時？
你聖誕假諗住去邊玩呀？你成世人收過最正嘅聖誕禮物係咩呀？你想聖誕老人送咩禮物俾你呀？
你覺得你喺倫敦每日淨係用五英鎊生唔生活到？
你覺得可以做啲咩嚟減低倫敦嘅空氣污染呢？
發展經濟重要啲吖，定係保護環境重要啲？
